name: openclaw-dashboard
description: OpenClaw 一站式可视化管理后台 — 配置编辑、记忆浏览、Skill管理、Cron监控、Session统计、Docker管理

deployment.notes: next build → out/ → nginx, SPA routing via try_files

conventions.icons: lucide-react only, no emoji in UI
conventions.api: proxy-server.js for local dev → OpenClaw Gateway API

pitfalls: Static export — no server-side API routes, all data via Gateway API
proxy-server.js handles CORS for local dev
channel-labels.json maps channel IDs to display names
